casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Danny Ray BUFORD, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156903-4
COA: 338221, 338222 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 15, 2017 orders of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
